mapper.sql: id, sevice_name, register_time, service_url, status, upload_strategy, check_strategy, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into ds_service_provider (id, sevice_name, register_time, service_url, status, upload_strategy, check_strategy, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{seviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serviceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadStrategy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkStrategy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update ds_service_provider set sevice_name = #{seviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, service_url = #{serviceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_strategy = #{uploadStrategy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_strategy = #{checkStrategy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
